title: Zero To Exam
summary: An AI-driven exam-prep platform for IB students. Builds personalized practice paths, diagnoses weak spots in real time, and adapts through continuous feedback to guide students from zero to mastery.

title: Relatus
summary: A full-stack personal CRM for relationships. Combines a React frontend with a Spring Boot + MongoDB backend to track connections, visualize interaction history, and automate follow-ups—helping users stay intentional about who matters most.

title: ContextToCanvas
summary: A modular LLM pipeline that turns raw structured data into ready-to-use visualizations. Integrates retrieval-augmented generation, evaluation metrics, and configurable orchestration for reproducible AI-assisted data storytelling.

title: ETH Royalty Demo
summary: A Solidity + Hardhat prototype that automates on-chain music-royalty splits between artists, collaborators, and fans. Features tokenized supporter rewards, customizable payout weights, and transparent, dependency-free ETH distribution.

title: TempFeel API
summary: A comfort-index service that quantifies how temperature actually feels by modeling environmental factors, clothing, and physiology—offering a more human-accurate metric than simple wind-chill or heat-index formulas.

title: Function Generator API
summary: A developer tool that lets Java applications call LLM-powered functions natively. Simplifies integration, handles prompt orchestration, and streamlines AI feature development across enterprise backends.

title: Chessi
summary: To help chess enthusiasts improve their chess intuition, I developed this app where users test their skills by guessing the engine's evaluation and by finding and playing the best move on the board.

title: TapSpeech
summary: A startup I co-founded focused on improving communication between residents and caregivers in retirement homes.

title: Productivity timer extension
summary: A Chrome extension that boosts productivity by splitting long study sessions into focused work and rest intervals.

title: MLA8 citation extension
summary: A Chrome extension tailored for creating MLA8 citations for Chinese websites to ensure citation format accuracy and speed up research workflows.

title: MLA8 citation machine
summary: A citation machine tailored to MLA8 rules for Chinese sources to help students cite materials correctly.
